info.name: Firefox | StatusBar FindBar and Notification glass
info.additionalInfo: Updates 06/03/2011 Fixed the border box of Snyc notification -> outset to solid. 28/03/2011 Fixed the #content and Sync notification border White text shadows on the notifications 31/03/2011 Fixed Findbar border radius on bottom 16/04/2011 Compact Find bar friendly whith Mozilla Prospector - Find Suggest https://addons.mozilla.org/es-ES/firefox/addon/mozilla-labs-prospector-find-s/ 31/05/2011 Personas can be used normally. 04/06/2011 Fixed notification bug. 14/06/2011 Findbar Isues Fixed. 01/07/2011 Findbar text shadows improved. 05/07/2011 Fixed the #content and Sync notification border 10/07/2011 Border Color change to firefox 6 native 02/10/2011 White Icons for browser-bottombox like Tabs Toolbar in Firefox 8 05/10/2011 Add support for new glass tab. 25/06/2012 Firefox 14 problems Fixed. 01/07/2012 Bugs Fixed. looks better whith -> http://userstyles.org/styles/42783 and for the new icos -> http://userstyles.org/styles/44811 See my other styles http://userstyles.org/users/82707
